header_summary: OP_RETURN outputs are pruned to reduce lookups and improve validation speed.Johan implements updated opcodes in btcd and questions sufficiency of deferred amount check.Josie suggests proposing expiration dates as their own BIP for compatibility with different address formats.ZmnSCPxj proposes `keysend` protocol for multipath payments with XOR operations and claim mechanism.

recent_posts.title: Pull-req to remove the arbitrary limits on OP_Return outputs
recent_posts.summary:
- OP_RETURN outputs are pruned, not stored in UTXO database for faster validation.
- Archival and block-pruning nodes retain raw OP_RETURN data to prove transaction validity.
- To verify blocks, OP_RETURN data must be provided to show correctly formatted transactions.

recent_posts.title: Concrete MATT opcodes
recent_posts.summary:
- Taptree verification update allows verification on input and outputs, making learning easier.
- Updated opcodes and example scripts for simulating CTV and Coinpools in btcd.
- Requesting rationale for opcode parameter ordering and suggesting improvements for amount check.

recent_posts.title: BIP-352 Silent Payments addresses should have an expiration time
recent_posts.summary:
- Josie expresses gratitude to Peter for his feedback and addresses the issue of expiration dates in Bitcoin.
- Josie suggests proposing expiration dates as their own BIP, considering different address formats.
- Josie presents scenarios and skepticism about expiration dates, proposing alternative solutions for silent payments.

recent_posts.title: Multipath Keysend
recent_posts.summary:
- ZmnSCPxj proposed a scheme for multipath payments in Lightning-dev mailing list.
- The scheme involves embedding preimage as TLV and using XOR to split keysend.
- The receiver can claim the entire funds after receiving and XORing the parts.

recent_posts.title: Blinded Paths Doom Scenario
recent_posts.summary:
- Tony mentions that deanonymizing techniques on the LN only deanonymize the recipient, not the sender.
- Bastien explains that when using a mobile wallet, the nodes know you are the sender/recipient.
- Tony discusses multiple deanonymizing techniques on LN and expresses concerns about privacy and decentralization.

recent_posts.title: Specification Meeting Transcripts

active_posts.title: Blinded 2-party Musig2
active_posts.summary:
- The email discusses the implementation of a version of 2-of-2 Schnorr Musig2 for statechains.
- The goal is to have a fully 'blinded' server (party 1) that holds a private key without learning certain information.
- Blinding considerations and steps are outlined in the provided link and any comments are welcomed.

active_posts.title: Ark: An Alternative Privacy-preserving Second Layer Solution
active_posts.summary:
- Ark is an alternative to the Lightning network, allowing liquidity-free funds transfer.
- It uses virtual UTXOs and restricts vTXO values for anonymity and efficiency.
- The protocol involves an intermediary called Ark Service Provider (ASP) for off-chain payments.

active_posts.title: Pull-req to enable Full-RBF by default
active_posts.summary:
- The author has submitted a pull request to enable full-replace-by-fee (full-rbf) by default in Bitcoin Core.
- Multiple block explorers and nodes have already enabled full-rbf, indicating its growing usage.
- The author suggests enabling full-rbf by default in Bitcoin Core's upcoming release, v26.0.

active_posts.title: Potential vulnerability in Lightning backends: BOLT-11 "payment hash" does not commit to payment!
active_posts.summary:
- LNbits team patched an exploit allowing attackers to create balances through invoicing quirks.
- Users are urged to update to LNbits version 0.10.5 due to the exploit patch.
- The incident highlights the sophistication of attackers and emphasizes the need for developer vigilance.

active_posts.title: Jamming Mitigation Dry Run
active_posts.summary:
- We are implementing a plan to conduct a "dry run" of HTLC endorsement and local reputation tracking.
- The plan includes collecting forwarding data, propagating an experimental endorsement TLV, and implementing local reputation algorithms.
- Multiple teams will be involved in this research, addressing privacy concerns and ensuring data analysis.
